entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm.
